net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Scorching Burst
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Scorching Burst
Usage: at-will * Keywords: Arcane, Fire, Implement
Action: standard * Range: Area burst 1 within 10 squares
Target: each creature in burst
Attack: +15 vs. Reflex
Damage: 1d6+11 (17+3d6 critical)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Freezing Cloud
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Freezing Cloud
Usage: recharge 1,2,3,4,5,6 * Keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement
Action: standard * Range: Area burst 2 within 10 squares
Target: each creature in burst
Attack: +15 vs. Fortitude
Damage: 1d8+11 (19+3d6 critical)
Effect: The cloud lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the cloud or starts its turn there is subject to another attack. You can dismiss the cloud as a minor action.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Bigby's Icy Grasp
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Bigby's Icy Grasp
Usage: recharge 1,2,3,4,5,6 * Keywords: Arcane, Cold, Conjuration, Implement
Action: standard * Range: Ranged 20
Target: one creature
Attack: +15 vs. Reflex
Damage: 2d8+11 (27+3d6 critical)
Effect: You conjure a 5-foot-tall hand of ice in an unoccupied square within range and the hand attacks. As a move action, you can move the hand up to 6 squares.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Winter's Wrath
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Winter's Wrath
Usage: encounter * Keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement
Action: standard * Range: Area burst 2 within 10 squares
Target: each creature in burst
Attack: +15 vs. Fortitude
Damage: 2d8+11 (27+3d6 critical)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Chill Strike
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Chill Strike
Usage: encounter * Keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement
Action: standard * Range: Range 10
Target: one creature
Attack: +15 vs. Fortitude
Damage: 2d8+11 (27+3d6 critical)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Ray of Frost
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Ray of Frost
Usage: at-will * Keywords: none
Action: standard * Range: Ranged 10
Target: one creature
Attack: +15 vs. Fortitude
Damage: 1d6+11 (17+3d6 critical)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Chilling Cloud
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Chilling Cloud
Usage: at-will * Keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement
Action: standard * Range: Area burst 1 within 10 squares
Target: each enemy in burst
Attack: +15 vs. Fortitude
Damage: 6 (6+3d6 critical)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Ice Storm
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Ice Storm
Usage: daily * Keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement, Zone
Action: standard * Range: Area burst 3 within 20 squares
Target: each creature in burst
Attack: +15 vs. Fortitude
Damage: 2d8+11 (27+3d6 critical)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Icy Rays
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Icy Rays
Usage: encounter * Keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement
Action: standard * Range: Ranged 10
Target: one or two creatures
Attack: +15 vs. Reflex
Damage: 1d10+11 (21+3d6 critical)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Set Health Bar
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Sets the health bar to the appropriate value.
